name: Spacecables
description:
Hi it is currently 2AM so this will probably be delirious

To play:

  • The left side of the board is the side of a spaceship and the right side is a space station. (I did not have time to texture these.)
  • Click and drag on ports to lay cables.
  • Connect matching input ports to output ports with cables.
  • There are 4 port types: water, fuel, electricity, and data. Water and fuel are carried over pipes; electricity and data are carried over wires.
  • Electricity and data must match the electricity amount in terawatts or data channel.
  • Press space to start your solution or tab to step once.
  • Press escape to quit a level.
  • Get your scores as low as possible!

The pipe laying is very janky, I know. A friend of mine is working on it but IDK if they will get it back to me in time.

Check this out on Github!
